item.title: What's the secret to a long lasting home paint job?
item.itunes:subtitle: Coleen Jurewicz interviews a painting contractor.
item.itunes:summary: Sacramento real estate broker Coleen Jurewicz (00826558) of www.HomeRocketRealEstate.com discovers what it takes to create a great paint job and why it may cost more than what other contractors are offering. What's the best way to choose a paint color? Listen as Coleen interviews painting contractor Sondra Anderson and find out. Coleen Jurewicz can be reached at (916) 682-6454. Coleen offers no-charge real estate consultations for individuals serious about buying or selling real estate. Additional keywords for this Sacramento real estate podcast: Painting, homes, interior, exterior, commercial, buildings structure, paid, license, bond, professional, focus, quality, prep, preperation, California, Nevada, Arizona, hotel, scope, driving, business, color, selection, brush, sample, hand, sprayer, careful.
